commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The first match went to Rin, and the second to Mari. Both teams are tied at one win and one loss each!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The next contest will determine everything! It's your time to shine, Maki!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Huh? M-Me?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Maki! We are entrusting you with all our hope. Please do what you can to tear the glory of victory from their clutches!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Um, no I... Can't we just leave it at a draw?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You cannot give up before you have even tried! It's okay, Maki. I know you can do it! I can picture you gliding gracefully across the ice rink!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: H-Hey! Don't pressure me! If you want to battle it out that badly then why don't you or Mari have another go?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I didn't come here to join in the skating competition! I said from the very beginning that I was only tagging along!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You are considered to have agreed to the competition from when you wrote your name down on the ladder.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let it go, Maki. I mean, I don't want you to give up on the competition, but this is the water-faring vessel you have boarded! You cannot disembark until the contest is over!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Water-faring vessel?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: She means a boat.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: We've come this far, so let's decide this once and for all. Kasumi is all ready to go so... Wait, huh? Where's Kasumi?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Hm? Oh, there she is. Kasumin! Where are you going? That's the entrance. You'll end up leaving the rink if you go through there!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Gah. O-Oh, Rin! I knew that! I was juuuust a little thirsty, so I was heading over to the vending machine.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: There's a vending machine right behind the bench. See? Right there.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh?! Oh, huh. Y-You're right.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: It's almost time for your match so you should hurry up and get ready!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, don't pull me like that! Gahhh! Stop strapping the skates to my feet! I can't give it everything I've got if someone puts skates on me.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I don't understand the nonsense you're spouting right now, but...you can't actually skate, can you?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wha?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You seemed pretty confident at the beginning, but your face stiffened up when you saw Mari's fancy moves in the figure skating contest.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A-A-A-As if! I'm cuter and more perfect than anybody else around! As if I can't skate! That's totally unthinkable!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Besides, you're the one who can't skate, not me! Isn't that right, Maki? You're not making any effort to skate at all.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Excuse me? What makes you say that? I just don't feel like skating, that's all.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Okay, okay! We'll know who can and can't skate once you're both on the rink!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Your skates are all nicely tied and ready, Kasumin!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Gahhhh! When did you manage to tie them on so tightly?!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ah! Where are you going, Maki?! Now is the time for you to carve your elegant figure across the shining ice rink! Go on!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Eek! L-Let go of me!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: All right! Let's get the third skating match going!
